name: Bugga Clicka!
description:
Bugga Clicka! is one of those games where the developer lost his mind, and tries to create original games out of thin air.

Well, heres Bugga Clicka!

You click da bugga right?

You make da Moola.

You buy da Custoemas, ya with me?

and, well, much more happens but... uh

Go play game please!
